subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Related to {{och-l|霖|long rain}}. {{zh-ref|Wang (1982)}} considers this cognate with {{och-l|淫|to soak; to drench}}. Also compare {{cog|nan|-}} {{zh-l|啉|tr=lim|to drink}}.
